trans-unit.source: How to use the Template Starter
trans-unit.target: Jinsi ya kutumia kianzishi cha Kiolezo

trans-unit.source: This special template lets you make your own templates. A template provides a set of related page layouts that an author can choose from in writing an original book. Usually the text blocks and picture blocks on template pages will be empty, ready for an author to fill in. Sometimes there may be standard text or pictures that should be on every copy of the page. There are two ways people can use your template. The first way is to start new books. For example, imagine student books that have one page for each school day of the week. You could make a template with 5 pages, each with places to type in text and choose pictures. Curriculum authors could select your template and make a new book, one for each week1.
trans-unit.target: Kiolezo hiki maalum inakuwezesha kutengeneza violezo vyako mwenyewe. Kiolezo kinatoa seti ya mipangilio ya ukurasa inayohusiana ambayo mwandishi anaweza kuchagua kwa kuandika kitabu asili. Kawaida kijisanduku cha maandishi na vijisanduku vya picha kwenye kurasa za kiolezo vitakuwa vitupu, tayari kwa mwandishi kujaza. Wakati mwingine kunaweza kuwa na maandishi au picha za kawaida ambazo zinapaswa kuwa kwenye kila nakala ya ukurasa. Kuna njia mbili ambazo watu wanaweza kutumia templeti yako. Njia ya kwanza ni kuanza vitabu vipya. Kwa mfano, fikiria vitabu vya wanafunzi ambavyo vina ukurasa mmoja kwa kila siku ya shule ya wiki. Unaweza kutengeneza templeti iliyo na kurasa 5, kila moja ikiwa na maeneo ya kucharaza maandishi na uchague picha. Waandishi wa mtaala wanaweza kuchagua kiolezo chako na kutengeneza kitabu kipya, kimoja kwa kila wiki1.

trans-unit.source: The second way people can use templates is as source of new pages, regardless of how they started the book. For example, in some places, each book requires a page as part of a government approval process. You might make a template containing that page and give it to others in your country. Then, when people translate a shellbook, they go to the end of the book and click “Add Page”. The page you made will appear in their list of choices. Some other ideas for templates are alphabet charts, glossaries, and instructions on how to use the book in a classroom. 2
trans-unit.target: Njia ya pili ambayo watu wanaweza kutumia kiolezi ni kama chanzo cha kurasa mpya, bila kujali jinsi walivyoanza kitabu. Kwa mfano, katika maeneo mengine, kila kitabu kinahitaji ukurasa kama sehemu ya mchakato wa idhini ya serikali. Unaweza kutengeneza kiolezo kilicho na ukurasa huo na uwape wengine katika nchi yako. Halafu, wakati watu wanatafsiri kitabu cha sheli, huenda mwisho wa kitabu na bonyeza "Ongeza Ukurasa". Ukurasa ulioufanya utaonekana katika orodha yao ya chaguo. Mawazo mengine kwa templeti ni chati za alfabeti, faharasa, na maagizo ya jinsi ya kutumia kitabu darasani. 2

trans-unit.source: Making templates is just like making any other custom book; all the same controls are available for making and customizing pages. But since you will probably be sharing with other people, there are a number of things you can do to help users of your template:
trans-unit.target: Kutengeneza kiolezi ni kama kutengeneza kitabu kingine chochote cha kibinafsi; udhibiti wote huo unapatikana kwa kutengeneza na kubadilisha kurasa. Lakini kwa kuwa labda utashiriki na watu wengine, kuna mambo kadhaa ambayo unaweza kufanya kusaidia watumiaji wa kiolezi yako:

trans-unit.source: Label Your Pages
trans-unit.target: Weka lebo kwa kila Ukurasa

trans-unit.source: When you add pages to your template, make sure to give each one a useful label3,4:
trans-unit.target: Unapoongeza kurasa kwenye kiolezo chako, hakikisha kuipa kila kiolezi lebo muhimu3,4:

trans-unit.source: Check Your Thumbnails
trans-unit.target: Angalia vijipicha vyako

trans-unit.source: To speed things up, Bloom only makes this thumbnail once, and stores it in the "template" subdirectory of your template:
trans-unit.target: Ili kuharakisha mambo, Bloom hufanya tu kijipicha hiki mara moja, na kukihifadhi kwenye kijitabu cha "kiolezo" cha kiolezo yako:

trans-unit.source: If you later make a change to the page, the thumbnail will be out of date. To fix that, click the "Add Page" button, and Bloom will regenerate those thumbnails. If the automatically generated thumbnail doesn't convey the purpose of the page, you can make your own. Just make sure to mark the file as "Read Only" so that Bloom doesn't overwrite it. You can also make your thumbnails as svgs, if you like (that's what we do for templates we ship with Bloom). In any case, make sure to click "Add Page" at least once before distributing your template, so that all the thumbnails are already generated.
trans-unit.target: Ikiwa baadaye utafanya mabadiliko kwenye ukurasa, kijipicha kitapitwa na wakati. Ili kurekebisha hilo, bonyeza kitufe cha "Ongeza Ukurasa", na Bloom itazalisha tena vijipicha hivyo. Ikiwa kijipicha kilichozalishwa kiatomati hakitoi kusudi la ukurasa, unaweza kutengeneza yako mwenyewe. Hakikisha tu kuweka alama kwenye faili kama "Soma tu" ili Bloom isiiandike tena. Unaweza pia kutengeneza vijipicha vyako kama svgs, ikiwa unapenda (ndivyo tunavyofanya kwa templeti tunazotuma na Bloom). Kwa hali yoyote, hakikisha kubonyeza "Ongeza Ukurasa" angalau mara moja kabla ya kusambaza kiolezo chako, ili vijipicha vyote viwe vimetengenezwa tayari.

trans-unit.source: Document Your Template
trans-unit.target: Document Your Template

trans-unit.source: Also consider adding a description of your template, like the one you are reading now. To do this, put a text file named ReadMe-en.md in your template's folder. This file should follow the markdown standard. To provide your instructions in other languages, make versions of that file that change the "en" to each language's two letter code. For example ReadMe-fr.md would be shown when Bloom is set to show labels in French. You can also include screenshots, like we have in this document. Place any images you use in a folder named "ReadMeImages", so that images are referenced like this:
trans-unit.target: Pia fikiria kuongeza maelezo ya kiolezi chako, kama ile unayosoma sasa. Ili kufanya hivyo, weka faili ya maandishi iitwayo ReadMe-en.mdkwenye folda ya kiolezo chako. Faili hii inapaswa kufuatamarkdown standard. Ili kutoa maagizo yako katika lugha zingine, fanya matoleo ya faili hiyo ambayo hubadilisha "en" kwa herufi mbili za msimbo za kila lugha. Kwa mfano ReadMe-fr.md itaonyeshwa wakati Bloom imewekwa kuonyesha lebo katika Kifaransa. Unaweza pia kujumuisha viwambo vya skrini, kama tulivyo katika hati hii. Weka picha zozote unazotumia kwenye folda iitwayo "ReadMeImages", ili picha zirejeshwe kama hii:

trans-unit.source: When the Add Page dialog box shows your template pages, it will show a thumbnail:
trans-unit.target: Wakati kisanduku kidadisi cha Ongeza Ukurasa kinaonyesha kurasa zako za violezi, itaonyesha kijipicha:

trans-unit.source: Share Your Template
trans-unit.target: Shiriki kiolezo chako

trans-unit.source: Remember that Bloom is about planting seeds, about sharing. So plan to share your template on the BloomLibrary for people around the world to find. This takes just a few clicks in the Publish Tab.
trans-unit.target: Kumbuka kwamba Bloom ni juu ya kupanda mbegu, juu ya kushiriki. Kwa hivyo panga kushiriki kiolezo chako kwenye BloomLibrary kwa watu kote ulimwenguni kupata. Hii inachukua mibofyo michache tu kwenye Kichupo cha Chapisha.

trans-unit.source: For local colleagues, an easy way to distribute your template is via a Bloom Pack. In the collections tab, right-click on your template's thumbnail. Choose 'Make Bloom Pack'. Save that somewhere, for example to a USB Key. Then take it to another computer, double click on the file you made, and your template will be added to the "Sources for New Books" on that computer.
trans-unit.target: Kwa wenzako wa hapa, njia rahisi ya kusambaza kiolezi chako ni kupitia Kifurushi cha Bloom. Katika kichupo cha makusanyo, bonyeza-kulia kwenye kijipicha cha kiolezi chako. Chagua 'Tengeneza Kifurushi cha Bloom'. Hifadhi hiyo mahali pengine, kwa mfano kwenya USB. Kisha upeleke kwenye kompyuta nyingine, bonyeza mara mbili kwenye faili uliyotengeneza, na templeti yako itaongezwa kwenye "Vyanzo vya Vitabu vipya" kwenye kompyuta hiyo.

trans-unit.source: Notes
trans-unit.target: Maelezo

trans-unit.source: 1: These books could later be combined using the forthcoming Folio feature. Note that Bloom does not yet give you a way to indicate that a page should be automatically included in new books; the author will have to add each one from the Add Page dialog.
trans-unit.target: 1:Vitabu hivi baadaye vinaweza kuunganishwa kwa kutumia kipengele kinachokuja cha Folio. Kumbuka kuwa Bloom bado haikupi njia ya kuonyesha kwamba ukurasa unapaswa kujumuishwa kiotomati katika vitabu vipya; mwandishi atalazimika kuongeza kila moja kutoka kwenye kisanduku kidadisi cha Ongeza Ukurasa.

trans-unit.source: 2: If you don't want the pages in your template to show up in the Add Page dialog, you can indicate this to Bloom by creating a file in the book's template folder called NotForAddPage.txt.
trans-unit.target: Ikiwa hutaki kurasa zilizo kwenye templeti yako zionekane kwenye sanduku ya mazungumzo ya Ongeza ukurasa, unaweza kuonyesha hii kwa Bloom kwa kuunda faili kwenye folda ya kiolezo ya kitabu iitwayo NotForAddPage.txt.

trans-unit.source: 3: People will not be able to translate your labels and descriptions into other national languages. If this is a problem, please contact the Bloom team.
trans-unit.target: 3 : Watu hawataweza kutafsiri lebo na maelezo yako katika lugha zingine za kitaifa. Ikiwa hii ni shida, tafadhali wasiliana na timu ya Bloom.

trans-unit.source: 4: If you want the Add Page screen to also provide a short description of the page, you'll need to quit Bloom and edit the template's html in Notepad, like this:
trans-unit.target: 4: Ikiwa unataka skrini ya Ongeza ukurasa pia itoe maelezo mafupi ya ukurasa, utahitaji kuacha Bloom na kuhariri html ya kiolezi kwenye Notepad, kama hii:
